roleset.name: come into existence (from)

role.descr: source, where substance is emanating from
location, where substance is emanating into

example.name: With Source
example.text: If the Kaine administration wants to align transportation and land-use planning, a good place to start would be with projects like this one that-3 *T*-3 emanate from the administration itself.
